description:
A young but capable Gjallarhorn special forces major who visits the Martian headquarters for an inspection. He is also an excellent pilot, and has his own Schwalbe Graze.
2nd season:After the death of Carta Issue, he has become the commander of the Outer Earth Orbit Regulatory Joint Fleet. He is trying to erase the suspicions of Earth`s economic blocs toward Gjallarhorn. As he participates in meetings of the Seven Stars as a representative of the Fareed family, his influence within Gjallarhorn continues to expand.
Source: en.gundam.info
name: McGillis Fareed
